resources.string: Spongebob. Why? Why did you set me on fire Spongebob? WHY DIDN\'T YOU JUST WRITE YOUR ANDROID APP?! *panicked gasp* STOP WASTING TIMEEEEE!!

This application utilizes Picasso, an LRU Cache, and the imgur API to display image search results in a grid view. Creating this was fun, thank you for checking out my app! All illustrations were created by me
